venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Genoa's veteran striker Goran Pandev scored a remarkable goal from near the halfway line but turned villain in the second half when he was booked tw
headlines.shortLinkText: Genoa's Pandev scores from 40 metres, later sent off in draw

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Forward Mario Balotelli gave struggling Brescia a 1-0 win at SPAL to lift them off the bottom of the Serie A table on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Balotelli nets Brescia winner after being dropped

headlines.description: Fiorentina's miserable season continued on Sunday when Torino beat them 2-1 in their fourth successive defeat in Serie A.
headlines.shortLinkText: Torino hand Fiorentina a fourth successive defeat

headlines.description: AC Milan defender Theo Hernandez scored at both ends and gave away a penalty as his side won 3-2 at Bologna in a dramatic Serie A match on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milan cling on at Bologna after Hernandez scores at both ends
